greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) read by rows. Signed subsequence of A051731.
comment: Let A=A176890*A176890, B=A*A, C=B*B, D=C*C and so on, then the leftmost column in the last matrix converges to the Moebius function A008683.
formula: T(n,k) = if n=1 and k=1 then -1 elseif n=k then 0 elseif k divides n then 1 else 0.
xref: This is A176918 * the diagonalized mu(n).
results.author: Mats Granvik and _Gary W. Adamson_, Apr 28 2010
